listitem.para: Kian Spongsveen proposed to write a Sybase ASE / SQL Server HOWTO which would contain installation and the first steps of basic usage. Real-world known problems one could hit during installation and pointers to further information would also be a part of the HOWTO.
Ariel Mella proposed to write a HOWTO on integrating Linux services and MS Domains.
Al Dev's Kernel HOWTO is updated to v6.3.
The ACPI HOWTO (Advanced Configuration and Power Interface) by Emma Jane Hogbin is at v1.2.
And v0.128 for the Debian Jigdo mini-HOWTO by Peter J. Salzman.
Reactions are coming in for the Athlon Powersaving HOWTO, v1.01 by Daniel Nofftz.
We published v2.2.7 of the DocBook XML/SGML Processing Using OpenJade HOWTO by Saqib Ali.
The Linux Cluster HOWTO by Ram Samudrala is at v1.1
The Samba Authenticated Gateway HOWTO by Ricardo Alexandre Mattar has been updated to v1.1.1
Svetoslav Slavtchev's XFree Local Multi-User HOWTO is at v1.1.0
The ATI R200 + XFree86 4.x mini-HOWTO by Håvard Stranden is at v1.2
The XFree86 Video Timings HOWTO by Eric Steven Raymond is at v6.4

sect2.title: TLDP-XSL stylesheets updated
sect2.para: David Horton sent in an update on the TLDP-XSL that he has been working on. His work is available as tldp-xsl-10JUL2003.tar.gz. The major changes since the last update includes producing formatting objects that can be converted into other formats using an FO processor.

sect1.title: Feedback and Contributions
sect1.para: Please help us create this weekly newsletter. Seen a site putting in a story with a link to the LDP? Completed the translation of any HOWTO? Know of any articles about the LDP published in newspapers or magazines? You can update us by sending in links and information at feedback@en.tldp.org.
LDP Weekly News is edited by Machtelt Garrels, Torsten Schlabach and Y Giridhar Appaji Nag with help from several other people.
